How to Apply Medical PG in Karnataka?

About Medical PG in Karnataka

KEA (Karnataka Examination Authority) conducts admission to medical PG in Karnataka. Medical PG in Bangalore will be granted on the basis of scores acquired in NEET PG by the candidates. The candidates must secure at least a qualifying percentile as specified by the NBE (National Board of Examinations). The number of PG seats in Karnataka is quite high compare to other states. Every year, most of the students take admission to PG courses in Karnataka because it provides top-class medical PG education with state of the art infrastructure.

Types of PG Medical Courses in Karnataka

There are some MBBS colleges in Russia that follow the method of teaching in only English language. Here is the list of the English-medium MBBS colleges with fee structure:

Medical Courses
Anesthesiology Dermatology Physiotherapy
Bio-chemistry Clinical Research Anatomy
Dermatology, Venereology & Leprosy Pharmacology General surgery
Pediatrics Medical Record Technology Orthopedics
Pathology Medical Imaging Technology Anesthesiology
Ophthalmology Medical Lab Technology ENT

Fee Structure for PG Medical in Karnataka

The fee structure for PG Medical in Karnataka is range from 1 lac to 8 lacs depending upon the colleges.

Top Medical Colleges for Medical PG in Karnataka

  • Kasturba Medical College, Mangalore
  • St Johns Medical College, Bangalore
  • MS Ramaiah Medical College, Bangalore
  • Bangalore Medical College and Research Institute, Bangalore
  • Kempegowda Institute of Medical Sciences, Bangalore
  • Jawaharlal Nehru Medical College, Belgaum
  • Dr BR Ambedkar Medical College, Bangalore
  • JJM Medical College, Davangere
  • Sri Devaraj URS Medical College, Kolar
  • Raja Rajeshwari Medical College and Hospital, Bangalore

Eligibility Criteria for Medical PG in Karnataka

It is important for the candidates to go through the eligibility conditions before applying for admission to medical PG in Karnataka. Some of the basic Medical PG in Bangalore eligibility conditions are as given below:

  • The candidates must have completed MBBS/BDS from any college recognized by the MCI (Medical Council of India) or DCI (Dental Council of India).
  • The graduates who will be completing or have completed the rotator internship on or before March 31, 2020, can take admission to the Medical PG course.
  • They must have got the registration certificate from MCI/State Medical Council or DCI/State Dental Council (SDC).
  • It is a must to secure the NEET PG cutoff qualifying percentile to qualify the entrance examination.

Scope of Medical PG in Karnataka

There are a lot of career scopes after Medical PG in Karnataka such as:

  • The candidates can be a specialist doctor in any field of their choice
  • They can work at any multinational hospitals across the globe.
  • They can open up their clinic and start practicing there.
  • They can also opt for going abroad and work there.

Advantages of Studying Medical PG in Karnataka

There are a lot of career scopes after Medical PG in Karnataka such as:

  • PG medical Karnataka colleges are approved by the MCI.
  • They offer top-class education to all medical candidates.
  • The candidates get training from skilled and expert professors.
  • Medical PG in Bangalore provides on-job training
  • Some PG medical Karnataka colleges also provide hostel facilities at very reasonable fees.
